settings.title: O'ahu, Hawai'i
settings.content: From crystalline beaches to lush rainforests, the aloha spirit permeates every aspect of life on O’ahu. Whether it’s an escape seeking tranquility or adventure, the magical land holds a special place in our heart. Ahead, Absorb Island shares cherished island memories and locations from a recent trip.

settings.credit: The Sunrise Shack | 2335 Kalakaua Ave, Honolulu, HI 96815, United States
settings.details:
Unofficially known as “The Gathering Place”, O’ahu is a mesmerizing blend of natural beauty, rich culture
and vibrant communities rooted in the traditions of the Hawaiian people. The
third-largest island nestled within the Hawaiian archipelago, O’ahu is a
revered paradise for locals and visitors.

settings.image_credit: Acai Smoothing Bowl | Blend: Acai, blueberries, coconut oil, honey, and salt. Toppings: Gluten free granola, bananas, coconut flakes, pitaya sauce, and honey.
settings.title: Acai Smoothing Bowl
settings.content:
The Acaia Smoothing Bowl from the Sunrise Shack in O'ahu, Hawaii, is a culinary symphony of tropical delights. Smooth and velvety, it combines the rich flavors of acai and blueberries with the subtle sweetness of coconut oil and honey, all balanced by a hing of salt to enhance the natural flavors.

Topped with a generous sprinkling of gluten-free granola, ripe bananas, and delicate coconut flakes, each spoonful offers a satisfying crunch and a burst of tropical goodness. Drizzled with vibrant pitaya sauce and an extra drizzle of honey, this bowl is a true celebration of the island's vibrant flavors and natural bounty, transporting you to a sunny beachside paradise with every bite.

settings.title: Chickens roam free in O'ahu
settings.credit: O'ahu's wild chickens: colorful, free-roaming descendants of Polynesian settlers.

settings.content:
Makapuu Beach

Sunrise ShackThe shack was technically born in 2016 on a small plumeria farm in the heart of Oahu’s north shore, but the seed was planted in the hearts of the founders long before then.

settings.title: Hygienic and Ultra-Durable
settings.content: We deeply understand the importance of freshness and durability when it comes to drying off.  Our recycled yarns have built-in SILVADUR™ antimicrobial and anti-odor technology for advanced protection against bacteria that causes smelly towel syndrome.

settings.title: our model malia says
settings.content: “I love taking my hoodie to the beach, it’s perfect to throw on after a swim”
